HOW TO

  1. Go to "What"
  2. Set template to "Custom HTML"
  3. Again, change to "Custom HTML"
  4. Click "Source" and paste the HTML there
  5. Click "Source" again to save, and double check to make sure everything fits within the mock-up - check different phone sizes as well
  6. Next set overlay to "Dark"
  7. Make sure Javascript is enabled
  8. Uncheck the "Include close button"
  9. Done ðŸ˜ƒ
